title: Firefox for Android 52.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Display end-of-life message on non-NEON devices (Bug [1305815][1]).  Firefox for Android 53 will require NEON capability.

[1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1305815

Disable presentation API to avoid page loading delays (Bug [1347755][1])

[1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1347755

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
